title: Correctly escape filenames
body: I'm currently trying to convert an application that contains some of the CoreUtils utilities (most notably, [.exe and ].exe). This fails abruptly at

comments.body:
There is a workaround but it will require a small amount of work. two characters weren't not properly escaped [ and ]. Since you have an MSI, you'll have to regenerate that without those in the path.
Once you do that, the converter will work.
We are looking into this. Thank you for your feedback!
